contextId.information: "I will crush to pieces ... I will burn up" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: will be crushed to pieces ... will be burned up

contextId.information: AT: "for I have taken away everything that might protect them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: for their protection is taken away

contextId.information: AT: "for you disobeyed like the people of Israel did" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: for the transgressions of Israel were found in you
it is destroyed with complete destruction
The regulations made by Omri have been kept
